attributes.action: to dig subways where there are street crossings to ease congestion on our roads and make it safer for the pedestrian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i propose where there are know congestion areas on our roads due to pedestrian crossings, subways should be dug to ease congestion, make it safer for the pedestrian and better for the environment.
doing this would stop the 1st and 2nd gear being used which is where most pollutants for our carbon footprint are heightened.
so, it would help the congestion, the drivers, the pedestrian and the environment.please consider this.
